name: Resolution_20-446.pdf
text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
D.C. Resolution 20-446, effective April 8, 2014

20 DCSTAT 3371

A RESOLUTION

Proposed
Resolution
20-525

To confirm the appointment of Ms. Sharlene J. Kranz to the Domestic Violence Fatality Review Board.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Domestic Violence Fatality Review Board Sharlene J. Kranz
Confirmation Resolution of 2014".

Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the appointment of:
Ms. Sharlene J. Kranz
3114 Wisconsin Avenue, N.W.,, Apt. 403
Washington, DC 200016
(Ward 3)
as a community representative member of the Domestic Violence Fatality Review Board,
established by D.C. Official Code § 16-1052, for a term to end July 20, 2016.
Sec. 3. The Council of the District of Columbia shall transmit a copy of this resolution,
upon its adoption, to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Domestic
Violence
Fatality
Review Board
Sharlene J.
Kranz
Confirmation
Resolution of
2014
title: Domestic Violence Fatality Review Board Sharlene J. Kranz Confirmation Resolution of 2014
